trends: There has been one other sighting in Huntsville

divs: Sighting DetailsI am passing this on from some friends of mine who have become amateur UFO hunters as a result of this sighting which was captured by them with a digital camera and by cell phone cameras. See below
Summary: a sphere with uniform radiating colored circles within its orb
